a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Homicide rate vs. GDP per capita, 2021
Homicide rate is measured as the number of intentional homicide deaths per 100,000 people.
Data source: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (2023); World Bank (2023)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
